name: Our perfect little Town
description:
In the dreamy little empty town, you're living in is soon going to be a big event.

One of the famous town judges is going to visit. Since you made it your mission to make your hometown finally get a rank up, you'll have some cleaning up to do.

Help the mayor tidy up the place!

Controls:

Use W A S D to move around. To interact with objects use E. If you want to open your inventory use I. In case you want to pause use P.

Credits:

Music & Sound: EpidemicSounds
